resources.string: "Manage your personal info, your privacy, and the security of your eduID."
"Click on one of the environments to use it in the app for communicating"
"You must be logged in to retrieve the information."

"Don't see a QR code?
Go to eduid.nl/security on your computer
Create a QR code
Scan the code here "
"Close the browser to delete the eduID."
"This is an overview of your information verified by educational or research institutions."
"This icon indicates that your eduID uses this information."
"Note: This information is required to log in with your eduID on certain websites. You can add the information again later."
"Could not retrieve URL for connecting your current account."
"The service will be permanently be removed."
"Your personal information may be shared when you use eduID to log in to other websites."
"For some websites, you need to verify your identity through an official party, such as your educational institution or bank."
"Your first and last name are not yet verified by a official party"
"You have not yet proven that you are a student in the Netherlands."
"You eduID is not yet connected to a official party"

"When you proceed you will be asked to login at the institution you want to connect to your eduID. First, select which institution you want to connect; then, login at that institution.

After a successful login you will come back here."

"When you proceed you will be asked to login at the institution you want to connect to your eduID. First, select which institution you want to connect; then, login at that institution.

After a successful login you will come back here."

"When you proceed you will be asked to login at the institution you want to connect to your eduID. First, select which institution you want to connect; then, login at that institution.

After a successful login you will come back here."
"Your eduID could not be connected. The account with which you just logged in, is already connected to a different eduID: %1$s."
"Your eduID could not be verified. The external account with which you just logged in, is already linked to a different eduID account."
"Your eduID could not be verified. The external account with which you just logged in, is already linked to a different eduID account: %1$s"
"Press the link in the email to confirm your change. The email was sent to %1$s."
"We couldn't confirm the change to your new email address: %1$s."
"Please enter your new email address. You’ll receive an email afterwards to confirm this email address."
"A verification email has been sent to %1$s"
"Your email address has been changed to %1$s"
"Your new email address is the same as your current email"
"This email address is already in use."
"A code to reset your password was previously sent to you. This code will no longer be valid. You will receive a new code to change your email address."
"The following information has been added to your eduID."
"Note: if you delete your eduID, you will also lose your unique eduID number connected to your email address."

"You can delete your eduID whenever you want.\nWhen you create a new eduID with the same email address, you’ll receive a new eduID number. This new number may cause some websites to recognize you as a new user. Good to know: deleting your eduID does not mean that all websites connected to your eduID will also delete your personal info."
"Something went wrong when generating your one-time password."
"Fortunately, you can log in another way:\n 1. Select ‘Enter Code’ under the QR code on your computer.\n 2. Enter the following code:"
"Note: your PIN has not been verified yet."
"If you can't login with the credentials above, scan again and enter the correct PIN code."
"Are you sure you want to delete your eduID?"
"Type your first and last name as they appear in 'Your personal info' to proceed."
"Your full name as used on your profile"
"The name you have typed does not match the name in your profile: "%1$s""
"All the information in your eduID belongs to you. You can download or delete this information. It also includes technical keys and references."
"Your information was downloaded in your Downloads folder."
"You can add a passkey to your eduIDto log in. You can use, for example, the built-in sensor of your device (TouchID, FaceID) or a separate hardware key (YubiKey)."
"Your device is currently remembered. You will be automatically logged in to eduID."
"When logging in with your eduID, you can choose to stay logged in. This remembers your login on the device you use at that moment."
"Want to log in quicker and more secure next time?"
"The eduID app allows you to log in extra securely, without needing a password."
"Enrollment is incomplete, either recovery was not complete or access was revoked"
"There is already a eduID app connected to this eduID.\nWould you like to unconnect that app and connect this one?\n"
"We will send you an email instantly with a link to add a password."
"We will send you an email instantly with a link to change or delete your current password."
"Pick a password that’s at least 8 characters long, containing at least one uppercase letter and a number. A longer password of 15 or more characters is also acceptable."
"Could not find the required info to change your password."
"When you prefer other methods than a password, you can delete your current one."
"Keys to securely log in without passwords or accessing your email."
"Are you sure you want to delete your key?"
"On this page you can manage your account."
"Note: if you delete your eduID, you will also lose your unique eduID number connected to your email address."
"Press the button to download all your personal data from your eduID."
"The download of your personal info from your eduID account contains all the information we have about you. It also contains technical keys and references."
"You can delete your eduID whenever you want."

"Note: if you delete your eduID, you will also lose your unique eduID number connected to your email address. When you create a new eduID with the same email address, you’ll receive a new eduID number. This new number may cause some websites to recognize you as a new user."
"Good to know: deleting your eduID does not mean that all websites connected to your eduID will also delete your info."
"Close the browser afterwards to complete the deletion of your eduID."
"Are you sure you want to delete your eduID?"
"You won’t be able to undo this action afterwards."
"Type 'delete' if you are sure you want to delete your eduID."
"Your full name as used on your profile"
"When you use eduID to logon to other websites, the following information can be shared."
"This icon indicates the service has access to your info."
"You did not yet use eduID to login to any service."

"* If you delete these login details, this information will be removed from your eduID. You will still have an account with the service itself. To delete that account, please contact the service directly."

"If you delete these login details, this information will
 be removed from your eduID. You will still have an
 account with the service itself. To delete that account,
 please contact the service directly."
"Are you sure you want to revoke the API access for %1$s?"
"This institution was connected to your eduID on %1$s at %2$s:%3$s"
"The connection with your institution %1$s has been removed"

"Are you sure you want to delete the connection with this institution?

Some services require that you your eduID is connected to an educational institution. You may be asked to connect an institution again if you use such a service in the future."
"Are you sure you want to delete your passkey %1$s? The passkey will be deleted from your eduID, but will not be removed from your browser and / or Yubikey device."
"Do you want to add a password to your eduID? Press Confirm below to receive an email with a code. Whereafter you can add a password."
"Do you want to reset or delete your eduID password? Press Confirm below to receive an email with a code. After you fill in the code you can reset or delete your password."
"Your password has been reset to a new password"
"Are you sure you want to delete your password? Log in with a password will be no longer possible."
"Make sure it's at least 15 characters OR at least 8 characters including a number and an uppercase letter."
"Send an email to reset my password."
"Forgot your password? Press 'Confirm' below to instantly receive an email with a code to reset your current password."
"You recently received a code to confirm a new email address. This code will no longer be valid. You will receive a new code to confirm your change password request."
"An email has been sent to %1$s with a link to reset your password"
"Before you can add a new passkey you must give it a name."

"A passkey is a separate or built-in device that is strictly personal to you, allowing you to prove that you are the owner of your eduID. Once you’ve added a passkey to your eduID, you can use it to log in. You can still log in using an email code or password as well."
"Press the test button to test one of your passkeys.\n You will be redirected to the eduID login screen."
"You successfully tested your security key to authenticate."
"Download the eduID app (by SURF) in one of the app stores."
"Have you installed the app? Then press ‘Next’"
"Enter the SMS code you received. It consists of 6 digits."
"to use a different phone number or resend code to receive a new verification"
"Can’t log in to eduID through the app or email? Try using a recovery method instead."
"You'll receive a SMS with a code."
"The code can be used to log in with."
"This code is active now, but you can generate a new code anytime."
"Are you sure you want to leave the page? Changes will not be saved."
"Your phone number is only needed for the security of your eduID, such as logging in if you forget your password."
"We will send you a code to verify your phone number."
"You've entered incorrect verification codes too many times. Please wait before trying again."
"You can now use the eduID app to quickly log in to services that require eduID."
"You can deactivate your eduID app if you want to reinstall this app or if you have a new device."
"Enter the recovery code you've saved during the eduID app registration."
"Press next to send a SMS with a verification code to your phone number."
"Max attempts used. Please contact help@eduid.nl for support"
"You’ve installed and registered the eduID app. Want to change your recovery method? First, confirm your identity using the eduID app."
"We have sent a push-notification to your app, to check it's you trying to log in."
"Scan this QR code with your eduID app"
"Learn how to register a new one."
"The verification from your eduID app failed. "
"You'll have to wait %1$s %2$s before you can try again."
"You are about to create an eduID that will be connected to your institution account."
"When you proceed you will be asked to login at the institution you want to connect to your eduID. After a successful login you will come back here."
"Your eduID has been connected to your insitutional account"
"You have successfully logged in at your institution. Please enter your personal email address now. This will be the email address eduID uses."
"The creation of an eduID for this email address is denied. Please contact help@eduid.nl if you think this email address is valid."
"This email address is already in use."

"This appears to be an email address from an educational or research institution. Note: if, in the future, you no longer study or work at this institution, you will lose access to this email address."
"We recommend using your personal email address for eduID."
"eduID is restricted to be used only for allowed domains."
"I agree with the terms of service and I've read the privacy policy."
"Waiting for you to click the link…"
"Can't find the email? Check your spam folder."
"Go back to the website where you wanted to log in and try again. You will then receive a new code."
"Check your inbox again. We've sent another email with a link."

"There are three ways to log in:
  1. You can receive an e-mail with a link
  2. You can use a password. You must first set this up in your eduID.
  3. You can use a passkey. You must first set this up in your eduID.
"
"Forgot your password or prefer to log in with a link? "
"Receive an email to log in instantly."
"The creation of an eduID for this email address is denied. Please contact help@eduid.nl if you think this email address is valid."
"We could not find an eduID with that email address."

"This appears to be an email address from an educational or research institution. Note: if, in the future, you no longer study or work at this institution, you will lose access to this email address."
"We recommend using your personal email address for eduID."
"eduID is restricted to be used only for allowed e-mail addresses."
"Make sure it's at least 15 characters long. Or at least 8 characters when including a number and an UpperCase letter."
"I agree with the terms of service and I've readthe privacy policy."
"You are still suspended. Try again in %1$s minutes."
"Use the eduID app to log in with your mobile device."
"Can't find the email? Check the spam folder"
"Waiting for you to press the link…"
"Can't find it? Check your spam folder."
"Go back to the website where you wanted to log in and try again. You will then receive a new link."
"Check your inbox again. We've sent another email with a link."
"You used the link in a different browser than the one you used to request it. For security reasons, we ask you to enter a verification code."
"We sent you an extra email with the verification code."
"Your eduID has been created. Proceed to your destination."
"To continue to %1$s, just complete the following:"

"Please go back to the screen where you requested the link and follow the instructions there.

You can close this tab / window."
"The link you used is either expired or has already been used."
"The code you used is either expired or has already been used."
"Press the button below to add a security key to your eduID. Please follow the instructions given by your browser."
"Your device will open a new window. Follow the instructions there to log in."
"You can;t use the passkey at this moment"
"Press the button below to test a security key. Please follow the instructions given by your browser."
"Your eduID is successfully connected, however the institution you choose did not provide the correct affiliation."
"You can try to connect to another institution or proceed to %1$s."
"Your eduID is successfully connected, however the institution you choose did not provide a valid name."
"You can try to connect to another institution or proceed to %1$s."
"Your eduID must be connected to an official party."
"Your first name and last name must be verified by an official party."
"You need to prove that you are enrolled in education. You can do this by connecting your eduID to an official institution."
"Your eduID is connected to an official party."
"Your first name and last name are verified by an official party."
"You have proven that you are following education by connecting your eduID account to an official party."
"Want to log in quicker and more secure next time?"
"The eduID app allows you to log in extra securely, without needing a password. Installing the app is quick and easy."
"Log in with the eduID app to ensure your identity."
"The eduID app allows you to log in extra securely, without needing a password. Installing the app is quick and easy. Please press Proceed for the next step."
"We discourage to log in without the eduID app. The service %1$s will not receive your attributes."
"The service you're logging into has explicitly requested you log in using the eduID app. If you log in with a different method, this application might not work correctly or allow you access."
"Do you want to use biometric login to access the eduID app more easily?"
"You need a PIN code to use eduID."
"Enter the PIN code and press OK"
"Do you want to log in to"
"The entered PIN codes were not equal"
"Enter the SMS code you received. It consists of 6 digits."
"Enter your PIN code to verify your identity with eduID."
"Welcome! You can use the eduID app for"
"your eduID eduID shares with these services"
"Continue in your browser to finish the connection of this app to your eduID"
"Something went wrong while creating your account. Please try again."
"Verify who you are in the field of education and research"
"We need to verify who you are before you can use eduID for services in the Dutch education system."
"Your full name, verified by an official party"
"You can provide this information by connecting your educational institution through SURFconext."

"eduID is an account for verifying your identity with Dutch education and research institutions. It is yours and not owned by the institutions.

• Log in to various services connected to SURFconext.
• You can create an eduID even if you don’t yet have an account with an educational institution.
• eduID is valid for your entire life, even after you graduate.
"
"All you need to do now is set a PIN code to use the app securely. Tip: also add a phone number in case you forget the code."
"I agree with the terms of service and I've read the privacy policy"

"Having trouble logging in to eduID via the app or email? You can also log in with an SMS code.

Which phone number would you like to use for this?
"
"Your educational institution has been successfully connected"
"The following information has been added to your eduID and can now be shared with other services:"
"This name doesn’t seem correct. Please enter a different name."
"This email address doesn't seem valid. Please enter a different email address."
"This phone number doesn't seem valid. Please enter a different phone number."
"Request cannot be completed at this moment. Please retry later."
"Cannot complete request, please log in and grant access."
"Could not request SMS code, please retry."
"Could not remove control code, please retry."
"Invalid password hash, please resend email link"
"Missing password hash, please resend email link"
"The key you want to delete was not found"
"The key you want to update was not found"
"Cannot parse enrollment challenge, challenge is invalid."
"Could not request deactivation code for known phone number: %1$s."
"There is already an eduID connected to this e-mail address"
"The e-mail address you specified may not be used"
"You have entered a wrong verification combination"
"An unknown error occurred with the following status code"
"This account is already linked to another device. Remove the other device from your account before registering a new one."
"Typed name does not match known name"
"Could not create eduid account for email %1$s."
"The email domain used in %1$s is not allowed."
"Too many attempts, please try again later"
"By adding an educational or research institution, you prove to eduID that you are a student or employee of that institution."
"Select a method to confirm who you are. Your first name, surname, and possibly your date of birth will be added to your eduID afterwards."
"Can’t use these methods? Visit our Help page."
"Through iDIN, we receive your name and date of birth from your bank. This ensures we know who you are. You are not making a payment. Learn more about iDIN."
"Can’t find your bank? Select another method to prove who you are."
"The following information has been added to your eduID and can now be shared."
"We also received new information. Do you want to use this for your eduID?"
"We’re sorry, we were unable to retrieve the requested information."
"You need to manually confirm your identity"
"You must confirm your identity at one of our eduID Service Desks.""
"Enter your full name as it appears on your ID (first and last name)."
"Present your code and ID to an eduID Service Desk. They will verify your identity manually.""
"We will redirect you to another website to enter your name. You won’t be able to log in to %1$s immediately afterward; you will first need to contact a eduID Service Desk."
"Please note: copies, public transport passes and student cards are not valid ID's"
"<sup>*</sup>EEA: all EU member states plus Liechtenstein, Norway and Iceland"
"Enter your details as they appear on your ID. Names must be in Roman characters."
"You will also receive an email with this code. The code is valid for %1$s more days and is intended for:"
"Schedule an appointment with an eduID Service Desk (online or in person). During your appointment, show your verification code and ID."
"Want to prove your identity another way? Make sure to delete your verification code first."
"Verify your identity at an eduID Service Desk by presenting your ID and verification code."
"Your code is valid for %1$s more days."
"I can't use any of the above methods"
"Didn’t receive the email? Check your spam folder, or "
"You've reached the maximum attempts and your account is suspended for 15 minutes."
"Check your inbox again. We've sent another email with a code"
"The code has been resent to your email address."
"Allow the mobile application to access your info."
"Failed to initialize AppData. No supported browser found."
